name: Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel, London
description: With a modern fitness centre and impressive city views, the 5-star Radisson Blu Edwardian, Hampshire has luxury bedrooms and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel is situated on Leicester Square, in the heart of Theatreland. The sumptuous bedrooms at Radisson Blu Edwardian, Hampshire have luxury marble bathrooms and Samsung Smart TVs with up to 300 channels in multiple languages. Rooms also feature Egyptian cotton bed linen, air conditioning, work desks, a mini bar, an in-room safe, iron and trouser press and tea and coffee making facilities.All bedrooms feature sustainable Noble Isle skincare products Leicester Square Kitchen showcases a selection of contemporary Mexican and Peruvian small plates with the finest wines and cocktails. The Hampshire Lounge Bar and al fresco terrace offers afternoon tea and light snacks. Guest can enjoy the convenience of the 24-hour fitness room. There are also 6 private meeting spaces that can host between 2 - 120 people. Situated in London’s lively West End, the hotel is a 5-minute walk from Covent Garden. Trafalgar Square's National Gallery and National Portrait Gallery are also within a 5-minute walk. Leicester Square underground station is a 3-minute walk from Radisson Blu Edwardian, Hampshire. The Royal Opera House is a 10-minute walk, and Oxford Street is half a mile away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Charlotte Street Hotel, Firmdale Hotels
description: Featuring design to reflect contemporary London life, Charlotte Street Hotel also boasts features of classic elegance such as period fireplaces and a wood-panelled library room. The hotel has its own brasserie whilst being only 5 minutes’ walk from the many bars and restaurants of buzzing Soho. Bedrooms feature artwork from the early 20th Century, and are styled with this period in mind. Classic prints and wallpapering accompany elegant beds and luxurious furnishings. Each en suite room comes with a TV, iPod docking station and a minibar. Charlotte Street Hotel features its own cinema room, 24-hour room service and a gym. Guests can relax in the drawing room or enjoy a drink in the Oscar Bar and Restaurant. The hotel is just a 5-minute walk from Tottenham Court Road Underground Station, providing links to the Northern and Central lines. The famous shopping stretch of Oxford Street is 2 minutes’ walk away, and guests can be at the British Museum in just under 10 minutes by foot.

name: 1 Hotel Mayfair
description: No description found

name: Intercontinental London Park Lane, An IHG Hotel
address: 1 Hamilton Place, Park Lane, London, W1J 7QY
description: Situated at one of the capital’s most prestigious addresses, InterContinental London Park Lane presents modern luxury in the heart of Mayfair. Inspired by its location overlooking the Royal Parks, the hotel delivers elegant natural interiors and sensational dining options. The flagship InterContinental Hotels & Resorts® property combines authentically personalised service with a Concierge team that brings insider London to life.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: JW Marriott Grosvenor House London
description: Located on Park Lane in the heart of Mayfair, our distinguished 5-star hotel offers exceptional accommodation, epicurean delights and sweeping views over Hyde Park. A stone’s throw from Bond Street, Knightsbridge, Regent Street, Buckingham Palace, V&A, Natural History & Science museums and the West End, explore London and all it has to offer from our doorstep. Experience modern luxury in a place where you can be mindful and present and indulge in our inspired service and nourishing surroundings. Make yourself at home in our welcoming guest rooms and suites complete with plush pillowtop beds, elegant marble bathrooms, beautifully curated amenities and high-speed Wi-Fi access. Maintain your workout routine in our modern fitness suite or recharge in our sophisticated Executive Lounge. Savour delicious cuisine at JW Steakhouse, experience award-winning Afternoon Tea in our Park Room or meet with friends for cocktails and nightcaps at the Bourbon Bar.Marriott

name: The May Fair, A Radisson Collection Hotel, Mayfair London
description: The May Fair, A Radisson Collection Hotel has been a luxury icon in London's most sought after address, since its doors first opened in 1927. The hotel enjoys some of the largest bedrooms in London including the iconic collection of suites. A 3-D cinema, tranquil May Fair Spa, 24 hr gym & adjoining Palm Beach Casino make it one of the city's most sought-after places to stay or visit. Just down the road from Buckingham Palace & Bond Street's exclusive jewellery stores, cafs & boutiques as well as Berkeley Street's world famous restaurants, its the perfect base from which to explore the fashion, art & culture that make Mayfair THE place to be for locals, celebrities & discerning business travellers alike. Green Park station is around the corner, providing easy access to Canary Wharf. From stylish doubles to luxurious suites each of the hotels bedrooms features elegant, contemporary dcor, decadent Italian marble bathrooms & luxury Vi-Spring beds with down pillows & 350 thread count Egyptian cotton bedding. All are equipped with free WiFi up to 150mbps on an unlimited number of devices & Samsung TVs offering up to 300channels in multiple languages. In selected suites, iPads let guests browse the hotels services & menus before ordering with the touch of a screen. The May Fair, Radisson Collection Hotel is a foodie heaven. The flagship restaurant of the award-winning Kitchens brand, May Fair Kitchen presents an intimate, secluded Japanese izakaya and Italian restaurant experience, hiding in the vibrant hum of Londons most iconic neighbourhood. May Fair Bar is a natural meeting point from early morning to late at night, often collaborating with renowned drink brands to host pop-up residencies within the space. May Fair Terrace provides a sleek, open-air enclave for drinks and cigars.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Milestone Hotel
description: Ideally located between central London's Knightsbridge and Kensington districts, the boutique 5-star Milestone Hotel Kensington boasts a resistance pool, a fitness centre, and a luxurious spa. Overlooking Kensington Palace and Gardens, this intimate hotel is just 10 minutes' walk from leafy Hyde Park and the Royal Albert Hall. Individually designed, each air-conditioned room offers a romantic elegance, a 24-hour front desk, and modern technology. With antique furnishings, fresh flowers, and fine fabrics, the luxurious rooms include a flat-screen TV with a DVD player, a work desk, seating area, and a mini-bar. With free toiletries, the en-suite bathroom has a hairdryer. The daily room service includes a complimentary treat, such as sweets, homemade cookies, seasonal fruits, or candles. Guests at the unique Milestone Hotel Kensington can enjoy a range of traditional food in the onsite Cheneston's Restaurant. Dishes are prepared using locally sourced and organic produce wherever possible and the chefs encourage individual requests. The intimate Stables Bar offers a range of over 400 vintage wines. Guests can also sip cocktails in the chic conservatory or take tea by the fire in the lounge. Dating back to the 19th century, the Milestone Hotel Kensington is ideally located for designer shopping, sightseeing, and enjoying London's superb range of entertainment. The Victoria and Albert Museum is just 1 mile away and the world-famous Harrods Department Store is within an 8-minute walk.

name: The Montague On The Gardens
description: The Montague On the Gardens Hotel London provides a cosy setting while in London. It is close to the British Museum, dining options and shops. This peaceful hotel provides an express check-in and check-out feature, valet parking and 24-hour room service. It has babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that operates 24/7. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a shower, cable/satellite channels and a flat-screen TV. They provide a desk, a seating area and an in-room safe. Montague Gardens Hotel's restaurants, Garden Grill and Blue Door Bistro, offer dinner each night. Each evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. London's well-known tourist spots are within close proximity to Montague Gardens Hotel London, with Central Saint Giles and Russell Square only minutes away. Guests can also discover Oxford Street.Revato

name: COMO Metropolitan London
description: Located amongst a range of well-known tourist hot spots, boutiques and eateries, COMO Metropolitan London is ideal for guests wanting to explore London and its surroundings. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a variety of facilities at the hotel, including body treatments, free Wi-Fi and a spa and wellness centre. Couples will delight in the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. Guests staying at COMO Metropolitan London can enjoy the luxurious rooms that provide a private bathroom, a mini bar and a coffee maker. They all include a desk and an in-room safe. During their stay at COMO Metropolitan London, guests can dine at Nobu, which serves South American and Japanese cuisine. Each evening, guests are invited to relax in the lounge bar. COMO Metropolitan London is within walking distance of Bond Street, Buckingham Palace and Grosvenor Square. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Knightsbridge Tube Station, which allows easy access in and around London.Revato

name: The Dixon, Tower Bridge, Autograph Collection
description: Occupying an awe-inspiring building that dates from 1906, when it served as the Tower Bridge Magistrates Court, The Dixon is a hotel that captures all the culture, creativity and variety of London SE1. Named after John Dixon Butler, the Grade II-listed building's original Edwardian architect, The Dixon is steeped in history but inspired by the contemporary character and culture of its vibrant neighbourhood. Its 193 rooms and suites, lounges and restaurant enjoy an edgy, eclectic design aesthetic and a boutique vibe. Tactile materials, surprising bursts of colour and finely-crafted details effortlessly complement the authentic original features. This place exudes style and charisma, from top to toe – with staff who'll treat you as the individual you are. The welcome is warm, the cocktails cool and the food flavoursome. Thanks to its landmark location in one of the world's most cultural postcodes, London's greatest cultural experiences – from the Tower of London to Tate Modern are just a heartbeat away.Marriott

name: Sofitel London St James
description: Sofitel London St James offers five-star accommodation in the heart of London West End. This landmark hotel - consistently rated as one of the best in London - combines traditional British design with contemporary style that is unmistakably French. Located in a grade 2 listed building, the hotel features a restaurant, Wild Honey St James, The Rose Lounge, the St James Bar, a large choice of conference suites and an award-winning spa. Sofitel London St James is an entirely smoke-free hotel.accorhotels.com

name: St Martins Lane London
description: With stunning, innovative design located within London's Covent Garden, St Martins Lane London boasts stylish public areas and guest rooms created by Philippe Starck. Rooms feature striking floor-to-ceiling windows and benefit from interactive light installations and flat-screen HD TVs. There is complimentary access to gym and complimentary gym kit laundry. Free bicycle rental is also available from the hotel. Situated just off the lobby, The Den and The Restaurant are the perfect places to enjoy the new All-Day Dining menu, afternoon tea, or sip on a Gin & Tonic. Step into gourmet eatery EllaMia London for a perfect coffee and sweet treat. As day turns to night, seek innovative cocktails behind the façade of a boutique tea counter in Blind Spot London. Charing Cross Station is just a 5-minute walk away, while Covent Garden Market and The Royal Opera House are also just 5 minutes’ walk away. Leicester Square is less than 10 minutes’ walk away, and Trafalgar Square is less than 5 minutes' walk.

name: The Goring
description: Just 0.5 miles from Buckingham Palace, The Goring offers elegant rooms, gourmet cuisine, and free WiFi. Guests have free fitness-club access, and many rooms overlook the large hotel garden. Boutique shops in Sloane Square are a 5-minute taxi ride, and within 1.2 miles are the Tate Britain and the Houses of Parliament. Guests are less than 5 minutes’ walk from Victoria Station, giving excellent transport links. The 5-star Goring presents spacious rooms with luxury décor, each featuring a seating area and a TV with films on-demand. Many rooms also have a private terrace. Guests can enjoy fine dining in the hotel restaurant where the chef uses carefully selected British produce. There is a range of wines to sample on the terrace that overlooks the private gardens.

name: Conrad London St. James
description: Set just steps from St James's Park, Buckingham Palace, and the Houses of Parliament, Conrad London St. James boasts a prestigious, historic facade and a classic, contemporary interior, which showcases stunning art and locally inspired design. The ideal location connects guests to iconic London landmarks and provides easy access to the City and major conference centres. The hotel's intuitive and personal service appeals to both today's smart luxury travelers and local clientele who came to dine or hold meetings in the inspiring setting. Inside you will find luxurious rooms featuring modern in-room technology and amenities, complete with spacious bathtubs and walk-in showers. Enjoy an elevated style of British cuisine by renowned Chef Sally Abe at The Pem restaurant, before sampling a pint of house draught from Meantime Brewery, or perhaps one of the selections of craft beers, wines and iconic gins in the Blue Boar pub. Savour a quintessentially English afternoon tea in the Orchard room, and enjoy innovative cocktails created by top mixologists in our glamorous cocktail bar The Hedgerow. Energize with the latest equipment in the 24-hour Fitness Center. With over 7000 sq. ft. flexible meeting space, state-of-the-art audio-visual technology and creative food, Conrad London St James is ideal for business events, conferences, and weddings.Hilton

name: The Hari
description: Just 10 minutes’ walk from Harrods and the Knightsbridge area, The Hari London features an on-site fitness centre, an 80-seater Italian restaurant and a bar with an outdoor terrace. Buckingham Palace and the Royal Albert Hall are only 1 mile from the hotel. An LCD flat-screen TV, handy phones, on demand movie library and an iPad/iPod docking station, as well as individual artworks from artists such as Tracey Emin, Mario Testino and Juergen Teller, are featured in all rooms at The Hari London. Free daily newspapers are also provided. Rooms with disability access are also available. The hotel’s Italian restaurant, il Pampero, showcases traditional, homemade Italian cooking in a contemporary London dining setting and features a central bar area. It allows for both table and counter dining with a variety of cocktails. The museum district of South Kensington is a 25-minute walk away, and Hyde Park is just half a mile from the property. Central London can be reached in 4 minutes via tube from Victoria underground station, which is a 15-minute walk from the hotel.

name: London Marriott Hotel County Hall
description: Embrace history and luxury at London Marriott Hotel County Hall, located in bustling South Bank. Our hotel is only steps away from London Eye, Big Ben and the iconic Westminster Bridge. Occupying London’s former County Hall, our hotel embodies the city's storied history and quintessentially British spirit. Take in views of the Houses of Parliament, Big Ben and the London Eye from our historic and iconic hotel. Our guest rooms and suites feature luxury bedding, pristine marble bathrooms and complimentary Wi-Fi;reboot in our gym and relax at our 25-metre indoor pool. Dine at Gillray’s Steakhouse & Bar, where you'll find over 100 gins and locally-sourced steaks from the artisan Browne’s butchers and enjoy award-winning Afternoon Tea in The Library. Dynamic business meetings and special events come to life at our hotel, which boasts 7,071 square feet of elegant space. Find a quintessentially British experience inside London’s most photographed destination.Marriott

name: The Beaumont
address: 8 Balderton Street, Brown Hart Gardens, London, W1K 6TF
description: Offering a popular restaurant, spa and fitness centre, The Beaumont Hotel is set in the prestigious London district of Mayfair. The original building dates back to 1926 and features an iconic, 3-storey high sculpture by the award-winning Sir Antony Gormley. The hotel offers free WiFi and easy access to London's shopping. Accommodation ranges from standard guest rooms with large king-size beds, to studios and spacious suites, all elegantly designed in Art Deco style with original artwork and antiques. Luxury bathrooms have black and white marble, heated floors. The hotel features Le Magritte Bar and The Colony Grill Room, which are popular with locals, while the Gatsby Room provides the ideal setting for afternoon tea or evening drinks. The hammam and spa offer grooming and relaxation treatments, and use of the gym, sauna and steam room is free for all guests. The hotel is in a quiet position overlooking a landscaped garden square. Selfridges is within a short walk, while Hyde Park can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. Theatres, art galleries and luxury shopping can be reached easily by Tube or car.

name: Hilton London Bankside
description: Featuring a stunning industrial design of bronzed metal, glass and layered brick, Hilton London Bankside places guests a stone’s throw from some of London’s premiere sites including Tate Modern, the South Bank and Borough Market. The local Bankside area is teaming with buzzing restaurants, bars and cafes as well as a storied history ready to be discovered. Attend a play at National Theatre or Shakespeare’s Globe, take in spectacular city views at The Shard and marvel at history in St Paul’s Cathedral. Corporate visitors will appreciate the short walk to the Financial District. Relax in a guest room detailed with contemporary furnishings and original artwork. For your comfort, all guest rooms feature air conditioning, complimentary WiFi, interactive LCD TVs and a work desk with ample outlets. Upgrade to an executive room for access to the tranquil Executive Lounge, including refreshments and business services. The hotel even features the UK’s first vegan suite where everything has been created from the finest natural materials. From the headboard made from pineapple leaves to the bamboo floor, each element has been designed to create a boutique, luxurious and welcoming experience. Enjoy seasonal menus with an innovative twist at in-house restaurant OXBO Bankside, perfect for a mid-week dinner with friends or colleagues or join the fun each weekend with OXBO’s famous bottomless brunch. Unwind with a cocktail or a gin and tonic, and savour some light bites in The Distillery Bar, a nod to the hotel building’s heritage. Maintain your exercise routine with the heated fitness pool and fully equipped fitness center which features a Peloton® Bike with toe cages.Hilton

name: St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London
description: Experience the iconic St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London. Originally opened in 1873, the historic hotel welcomes guests with five-star amenities, spacious rooms and superb service. Every pet-friendly hotel room and suite combines a sense of elegant history with modern comfort and includes plush bedding, flat-screen TVs, Wi-Fi and inviting decor. In the heart of King's Cross, you'll appreciate our proximity to King's Cross Station, the Eurostar, Camden Town, Regent's Canal and the buzzing Granary Square. We are also near the Royal Opera House, The British Museum and Convent Garden. Enjoy expanded living rooms and access to exclusive amenities at our Chambers Club. Take advantage of our spa, gym and stunning indoor pool. Choose one of our exquisite venues for your event, be it a lavish London wedding or a small business gathering. Famous as a hotel wedding venue, each wedding package is supported by expert planning services, custom catering and audiovisual technology.Marriott

name: Royal Lancaster London
description: The five-star Royal Lancaster London is renowned for its panoramic views over Hyde Park. The 411 well-appointed guestrooms and suites have luxurious and elegant dcor and are fully-equipped with modern facilities such as air-conditioning, satellite television channels, mini bars, en-suite bathrooms and power showers. During their stay, guests can dine in the award-winning Nipa restaurant, offering authentic Thai cuisine. Additionally Tony Page at Island Grill offers an alternative a la carte experience. Royal Lancaster London is one of Europes leading and most flexible meeting and banqueting venues. Its conference rooms have the ability to cater for all sizes of events, from small business meetings, to large receptions for up to 3,000 people. The hotel is only a few minutes walk from the bustling shopping districts of Oxford and Bond Street, London's West End theatres, museums and tourist attractions. Even Heathrow Airport is a mere 20-minute ride on the Heathrow Express from the nearby Paddington Railway Station.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Chelsea Harbour Hotel and Spa
description: Located in London, The Chelsea Harbour Hotel provides free wireless internet and a gym. It offers 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This relaxed hotel provides a number of amenities, such as 24-hour room service, valet parking and an express check-in and check-out feature. Facilities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. It also has its very own wellness centre, The Blue Harbour Health Club and Spa. Guests staying at The Chelsea Harbour Hotel can relax in their stylish rooms that offer a mini bar, tea and coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. They feature a desk, an in-room safe and heating. The Chelsea Harbour Hotel is under a 30-minute drive from London Heathrow Airport and Chelsea F.C. is a short walk away. It is within walking distance of Fulham Broadway Tube Station, which allows for convenient access in and around London.Revato

name: Courthouse Hotel
description: This 5-star Westminster hotel provides views of the skyline and is a five-minute walk from Oxford Circus Tube Station. It also features an indoor pool and a sauna and unique views of London. Courthouse Hotel London treats guests to superior amenities, including a rooftop terrace and Sanook. Facilities include complimentary wireless internet and valet parking. The rooms at Courthouse Hotel London are air-conditioned and offer a laptop safe, a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. Courthouse Hotel London boasts convenient dining options, including Asian dishes at Silk and Asian food at Carnaby. Each evening, guests are able to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and cafés in the vicinity. The hotel is within walking distance of Leicester Square, the Her Majesty's Theatre and Oxford Street. Central Saint Giles and Piccadilly Circus are a short walk away.Revato

name: The Lanesborough, Oetker Collection
description: This 5-star hotel is in London's Knightsbridge and looks out over Hyde Park. It has air-conditioned luxury rooms and offers a personal butler service, free WiFi and an in-room tablet. The Lanesborough, Oetker Collection's traditional rooms mix 19th-century style with modern luxury. Many also have scenic views over Hyde Park. Additionally, guests at this hotel gain complimentary access to The Lanesborough, Oetker Collection Club & Spa which includes fitness, spa and well being facilities. The hotel's The Lanesborough Grill restaurant serves outstanding, creative food. Guests can enjoy breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea and dinner here, with a wine and champagne list to complement the flavours of each dish. The Library Bar is home to an array of Cognacs, cocktails, wines and spirits, celebrating award-winning mixology and an unrivalled selection of pre-French revolution Cognacs. There is also a fitness room and beauty treatment facilities, and a unique cigar lounge with a collection of Cognacs and cigars. The Lanesborough, Oetker Collection offers complimentary calls to the US and Europe.

name: Bankside Hotel, Autograph Collection
description: Bankside, an independent hotel set on the culturally vibrant South Bank London, is a social hub for anyone with a passion for culture, art and food. This intimate hotel, with 161 bedrooms including seven suites, feels like home thanks to the use of hand-picked furnishings, specially commissioned artworks and friendly, intelligent service.Lines are blurred between work and play, with social spaces providing an inspirational environment for a dynamic guest experience. These include Art Yard Bar & Kitchen, a library and an outside terrace. There are four meeting & event spaces including Whitebox; a blank canvas for guests to create their own setting. Located across from the City, just a four-minute walk to Southwark and Blackfriars stations, where tube lines offer easy access across the capital. Waterloo station is less than 10 mins walk. Nearby are Tate Modern, Shakespeare’s Globe and the National Theatre, Borough Market is also close, as are some of the capital’s top foodie restaurants.Marriott

name: The Savoy
description: The Savoy has been at the forefront of the luxury hotel scene for over 130 years. The hotel 267 rooms and suites celebrate The Savoy dual historical influence with either Edwardian or art deco design, and guests of suites are looked after by the Savoy Butlers. Within The Savoy, guests will also find some of the most well-known restaurants and bars in London. With exceptional service at the heart of everything, a Savoy experience is built on memories created and stories told across the generationsaccorhotels.com

name: St. Ermin's Hotel, Autograph Collection
description: Inspired by England's indelible history and informed by its dynamic present, St. Ermin's Hotel, Autograph Collection is a luxury destination amid the best of central London. Immerse yourself in stylish comfort in 4-star accommodations with contemporary amenities, premium bath products and high-speed Wi-Fi. Discover some of the world's most celebrated attractions, including Westminster Abbey, Big Ben and Buckingham Palace. Host flawless corporate events and elegant social engagements in sophisticated event spaces, enhanced by expert planners and custom catering. Punctuate your day by exploring the dramatic elements of our historic grounds and beautifully manicured courtyard. Or, savor delectable British fare at our Caxton Bar and Grill, and sip fine wines and creative cocktails at our stylish bar. A distinctive haven of modern comfort, our hotel provides distinguished luxury that captures London's historic essence.Marriott

name: Hyatt Place London Heathrow Airport
address: The Grove, Bath Road, West Drayton, UB7 0DG
description: Offering a convenient base for guests wishing to experience London's well-known nightlife, the hotel features a 24-hour reception and views of London Heathrow Airport. Those staying at the property can also enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi. This elegant hotel offers meeting rooms, an express check-in and check-out feature and a concierge. Airport transfers, a laundry service, a dry cleaning service and a wake-up service are available upon enquiry. Hyatt Place London Heathrow Airport provides 351 air conditioned rooms filled with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Also included in the rooms are a hairdryer, an in-room safe and an ironing board. Guests of Hyatt Place London Heathrow Airport can relax at the in-house bar, ideally based for socialising in the evening. For guests who enjoy exploring local dining options, there is a wide range within walking distance. The hotel's multilingual staff will ensure that every guest has a comfortable visit.Revato

name: The Montcalm at the Brewery London City
description: In the heart of London City district, this 5-star hotel offers luxury rooms with stylish bathrooms and iPod docks. The Barbican Train and Underground Station is less than a 10 minute walk away. Modern rooms at Montcalm feature flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. Luxury toiletries, bathrobes and large-head showers feature in each black-tiled bathroom. Some rooms also boast marble bathrooms or hand-woven wool carpets. Montcalm London City's restaurant serves a seasonal menu with local produce in a chic setting. King’s Head gastro pub offers cask ales, fine wines, and relaxed dining. Traditional afternoon tea and pastries can also be enjoyed in the hotel’s lounges. The Barbican Center and Barbican Cinema are very nearby, less than a one-minute walk.

name: Nobu Hotel London Portman Square
description: Set in London’s West End, this modern hotel is just a 5-minute walk from Oxford Street and Hyde Park featuring 249 guest rooms and suites. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, world class dining experiences such as Nobu Restaurant, Nobu Bar & Terrace, plus the relaxed restaurant and bar, The Lounge. We welcome you to our luxurious and ultra-zen Nobu Wellness & Fitness, offering a range of Grown Alchemist treatments, and the world’s first Nobu Pilates Reformer studio. Each room at Nobu Hotel London Portman Square is perfect for an overnight stay in the city; individually designed, featuring comfortable bedding, flat-screen TVs, minibars and a 24-hour room service menu, whether in a suite with spacious living areas overlooking the London skyline or in a contemporary yet cosy space/bedroom. Each bedroom takes its conceptual cues from the traditional English garden within the adjacent Portman Square, drawing on the natural materials, textures and tranquillity of this urban oasis. Marble Arch Tube Station is just a 5-minute walk away and provides excellent access to the rest of London.

name: Warren House
address: Warren Road, Kingston upon Thames, KT2 7HY
description: A 5-minute walk from Richmond Park, Warren House is a stunning Victorian mansion complete with private gardens. Located 10 miles from Central London'and 6 miles from Twickenham stadium, Warren House boasts a range of amenities and services available for guests. During the warmer months, garden games including croquet are provided in the idyllic grounds. Each room is elegantly furnished and has a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a Bose CD music system. Most rooms are based in the main building while others are adjacent. There are several private rooms that guests may dine in. The cuisine features local and organic produce, some taken from the orchards and meadows in the grounds. A 19th-century Grade II Listed building, Warren House is also a perfect venue for conferences, meetings and events. Hampton Court is 7 km from the property. Reservations for overnight accommodations do not include rights to use the rooms, property or grounds for professional photography of any kind. For commercial photography requests, please contact this property directly. Breaching these terms will result in legal action being taken.

name: Hilton London Heathrow Airport
description: Hilton London Heathrow Airport is well connected to transport hubs, with direct access into Heathrow Airport’s Terminal 4 via a covered walkway. The hotel is located less than 15 minutes from Heathrow Terminals 2, 3, and 5, and our guest service team will be happy to assist with your connection. Paddington Station in Central London is 30 minutes away via Heathrow Express. Windsor Castle, and LEGOLAND® Windsor Resort are within 12 miles of our door. With 398 guest rooms, which includes executive rooms and stylish suites for the ultimate in luxury, the hotel also offers guests a whole host of amenities. Along with an onsite gym, fitness lovers can take advantage of the running and walking trails in the parklands around the hotel, or enjoy a meal, snack, or drink in one of the three OXBO dining experiences, which are available from early morning until late at night. The hotel boasts an OXBO Café, OXBO Bar, and OXBO Kitchen, each offering their own distinct menu – but all offering responsibly sourced, comforting, and generous dishes. The hotel has extensive conference, events, and meeting facilities, with 15 meeting rooms which can easily accommodate numbers from one to 300. The event spaces include the Concorde Atrium, with floor to ceiling windows, allowing natural light to infiltrate the space with a fantastic view over the hotel pond. It can easily accommodate up to 140 people and is versatile enough to accommodate everything from a drinks reception to a product launch. As an unexpected feature at an airport hotel, the Concorde Atrium space conveniently leads directly to the outside beach terrace, an unexpected quiet space to get some fresh air during breaks, host a casual drinks reception, or partake in a team activity. This area is completely separate to the Concorde Suite and can be booked privately.Hilton
